Description.English: For Modders: shared_LuaTools_Medium_Serp. Includes a bit more advanced Anno 1800 lua helpers, like ongameloaded/ongameleft events, objectfinder, cache, coopcount MP compatible ChangeOwner and so on. shared_LuaTools_Light_Serp is included as shared mod. Also consider using my LuaTools Ultra mod for even more lua features.
